```{r include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
ros_floods <- read_xlsx("tables_plots/ros_floods_tarouilly.xlsx")
```

```{r}
the_floods <- ros_floods %>%
  filter(Date >= as.Date("1984-10-01"),
         Date <= as.Date("2021-09-30")) %>%
  mutate(date_minus_7 = Date - days(7),
         date_plus_7 = Date + days(7)) %>%
  arrange(rank)
```
